text:
Violeta Rosa Ester Vidaurre Heiremans (born 12 September 1928), better known as Violeta Vidaurre, is a Chilean actress. She was born in Traiguén, Chile. Her career lasted from 1959 to 2016. She starred in many telenovelas. Her best known appearances in telenovelas were "Romané" and "Pampa Ilusión".
In 2017, Vidaurre was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.
